title: The Chattering Clams feat. Mindy Thomas and Guy Raz
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Mindy Thomas and Guy Raz — hosts of NPR’s "Wow! in the World" podcast — star in this whimsical Native American tale about the dangers of gossip.
itunes:author: WBUR
